channel.title: Akala's "Freedom Lasso"
channel.description:
Well well well, I fuckin' [i]hate[/i] British Hip-Hop. Usually. Gave Akala's new album "Freedom Lasso" a listen this morning, and it's fuckin' awesome. I'm surprised, I didn't like his last one at all. http://www.myspace.com/akalamusic He's got the whole thing up on there, give it a listen. Highlights: "Electro Livin", "Freedom Lasso", "Defeated" and especially "Where I'm from".
here in england now we've got bloods and crips, i'm ashamed and embarassed to have to admit, our grandparents got chased because they were black, now we kill each other for colours in the union jack shit this is not the states, no american dream, just a british nightmare with a similar theme.

item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

I’m going to download his album. Never heard of him before, but I really like his stuff. Thanks.

item.title: Akala's "Freedom Lasso"
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Yeah I can see where you’re coming from with that, that’s pretty much what pissed me off about him before, along with the shitty anti-iraq war stuff he did which was blatently forced and done for a quick buck.

IMO he seems to have actually found a message this time round though, and it works.

Read full topic

Good that you like it, but imo it’s shit. He’s a wannabe black person, even he is black already.
